textAfterTable: Selected Item Image (Click image links in Overview to display a new image. Be patient, it may take a moment to load.) Vehicle/Beast Features Opening Cockpit, Astromech Droid Port, Wings Open and Close, Retractable Landing Gear Notes The X-Wing Starfighter was released in several, slightly different, versions. Each version was a different squad number, designated by the number of red stripes found on either wing, and came with a different set of figures.   The original Series Alpha release had several minor paint variations, the most obvious one being white bands painted around the X-Wing's engines. Later releases did not include the white paint. The Red 5 X-Wing was also sold as a mail order item through Avon.   Have something to contribute to this page? Send me
